Uses of Interface
ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces.Node

Packages that use Node
ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer

Uses of Node in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
 

Classes in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer that implement Node
 class Group
          A group is an abstract superclass for all the nodes in a GraphSceneManager that do not contain an actual shape but rather a collection of child nodes.
 class Leaf
          This is the abstract super class of all the nodes in a graph scene manager that contain an element that needs to be drawn.
 class PhysicsGroup
          The PhysicsGroup class extends the abstract Group class to provide an interface between the actual 3D scene and its interaction with the underlying physics engine.
 class ShapeNode
          A ShapeNode is a leaf in the GraphSceneManager.
 class TransformGroup
          A TransformGroup is a Group that has a transformation stored.
 

Fields in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer declared as Node
 Node RayShapeIntersection.node
          The node that holds the associated shape.
 

Methods in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer that return Node
 Node Plane.getNode()
          Gets the node that is currently manipulated.
 Node Trackball.getNode()
          Gets the corresponding node.
 Node RenderItem.getNode()
          Gets the node that stores the shape.

 void AbstractSceneManager.setRoot(Node root)

          Gets the parent of the node.
 Node SceneManagerInterface.getRoot()
